Package com.atakmap.map.layer.feature.geometry.opengl

Class GLExtrude

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.map.layer.feature.geometry.opengl.GLExtrude
  • @Deprecated
@DeprecatedApi(since="5.3",
               forRemoval=true,
               removeAt="5.6")
public class GLExtrude
extends java.lang.Object
    Deprecated.
    to be removed without replacement
    Implements a few utility functions for extruding shapes into 3d objects and outlines.

    • Method Detail

      • extrudeRelative

        public static java.nio.DoubleBuffer extrudeRelative​(double baseAltitude,
                                                    GeoPoint[] points,
                                                    boolean closed,
                                                    double... extrudeHeights)
        Deprecated.
        Extrude the given shape using a relative altitude. The base of the shape will be baseAltitude and the top will be baseAltitude + extrudeHeight.
        Parameters:
        baseAltitude - The altitude of the shape's base.
        points - The shape's points.
        closed - True if the shape is closed, false if open
        extrudeHeights - The height(s) to extrude to. If a single value is passed in, the extrusion will be a fixed height relative to the points
        Returns:
        The extruded shape.

      • extrudeRelative

        public static java.nio.DoubleBuffer extrudeRelative​(double baseAltitude,
                                                    double extrudeHeight,
                                                    GeoPoint[] points,
                                                    boolean closed)
        Deprecated.
        Extrude the given shape using a relative altitude. The base of the shape will be baseAltitude and the top will be baseAltitude + extrudeHeight.
        Parameters:
        baseAltitude - The altitude of the shape's base.
        extrudeHeight - The height to extrude to.
        points - The shape's points.
        closed - True if the shape is closed, false if open
        Returns:
        The extruded shape.

                                                    double... extrudeHeights)

      • extrudeRelative

        public static java.nio.DoubleBuffer extrudeRelative​(double baseAltitude,
                                                    java.nio.DoubleBuffer points,
                                                    int pointSize,
                                                    boolean closed,
                                                    boolean triangulateTopFace,
                                                    double... extrudeHeights)

      • extrudeRelative

        public static java.nio.DoubleBuffer extrudeRelative​(double baseAltitude,
                                                    java.nio.DoubleBuffer points,
                                                    int pointSize,
                                                    int options,
                                                    double... extrudeHeights)
        Deprecated.
        Extrude the given shape using a relative altitude. The base of the shape will be baseAltitude and the top will be baseAltitude + extrudeHeight.
        Parameters:
        baseAltitude - The altitude of the shape's base.
        points - The shape's points.
        pointSize - The number of components for the shape's points (should only be 2 or 3).
        options - Extrusion options
        extrudeHeights - The height(s) to extrude to. If a single value is passed in, the extrusion will be a fixed height relative to the points
        Returns:
        The extruded shape.

      • extrudeRelative

        public static java.nio.DoubleBuffer extrudeRelative​(double baseAltitude,
                                                    double extrudeHeight,
                                                    java.nio.DoubleBuffer points,
                                                    int pointSize,
                                                    boolean closed)
        Deprecated.
        Extrude the given shape using a relative altitude. The base of the shape will be baseAltitude and the top will be baseAltitude + extrudeHeight.
        Parameters:
        baseAltitude - The altitude of the shape's base.
        extrudeHeight - The height to extrude to.
        points - The shape's points.
        pointSize - The number of components for the shape's points (should only be 2 or 3).
        closed - True if the shape is closed, false if open
        Returns:
        The extruded shape.

      • extrudeOutline

        public static java.nio.DoubleBuffer extrudeOutline​(double baseAltitude,
                                                   GeoPoint[] points,
                                                   int options,
                                                   double... extrudeHeights)
        Deprecated.
        Generates a vertex buffer for line segments (GL_LINES) for the outline of an object.
        Parameters:
        baseAltitude - Altitude of the lower horizontal outline segments.
        points - Input surface level geometry. Altitude is ignored.
        options - Extrusion options
        extrudeHeights - Altitude(s) of the upper horizontal outline segments. A single value will extrude by a fixed height.
        Returns:
        line segment buffer with 3 components per vertex.

      • extrudeOutline

        public static java.nio.DoubleBuffer extrudeOutline​(double baseAltitude,
                                                   GeoPoint[] points,
                                                   boolean closed,
                                                   boolean simplified,
                                                   double... extrudeHeights)
        Deprecated.

      • extrudeOutline

        public static java.nio.DoubleBuffer extrudeOutline​(double baseAltitude,
                                                   double extrudeHeight,
                                                   GeoPoint[] points,
                                                   boolean closed,
                                                   boolean simplified)
        Deprecated.
        Generates a vertex buffer for line segments (GL_LINES) for the outline of an object.
        Parameters:
        baseAltitude - Altitude of the lower horizontal outline segments.
        extrudeHeight - Altitude of the upper horizontal outline segments.
        points - Input surface level geometry. Altitude is ignored.
        closed - True if the outline is closed, false if open
        simplified - True to reduce the amount of vertical lines
        Returns:
        line segment buffer with 3 components per vertex.

      • extrudeOutline

        public static java.nio.DoubleBuffer extrudeOutline​(double baseAltitude,
                                                   java.nio.DoubleBuffer points,
                                                   int pointSize,
                                                   int options,
                                                   double... extrudeHeights)
        Deprecated.
        Generates a vertex buffer for line segments (GL_LINES) for the outline of an object.
        Parameters:
        baseAltitude - Altitude of the lower horizontal outline segments.
        points - Input surface level geometry.
        pointSize - Components per vertex in points. At least 2, altitude is ignored
        options - Extrusion options
        extrudeHeights - Altitude of the upper horizontal outline segments. A single value will extrude by a fixed height
        Returns:
        line segment buffer with 3 components per vertex.

      • extrudeOutline

        public static java.nio.DoubleBuffer extrudeOutline​(double baseAltitude,
                                                   java.nio.DoubleBuffer points,
                                                   int pointSize,
                                                   boolean closed,
                                                   boolean simplified,
                                                   double... extrudeHeights)
        Deprecated.

      • extrudeOutline

        public static java.nio.DoubleBuffer extrudeOutline​(double baseAltitude,
                                                   double extrudeHeight,
                                                   java.nio.DoubleBuffer points,
                                                   int pointSize,
                                                   boolean closed,
                                                   boolean simplified)
        Deprecated.
        Generates a vertex buffer for line segments (GL_LINES) for the outline of an object.
        Parameters:
        baseAltitude - Altitude of the lower horizontal outline segments.
        extrudeHeight - Altitude of the upper horizontal outline segments.
        points - Input surface level geometry.
        pointSize - Components per vertex in points. At least 2, altitude is ignored
        closed - True if the outline is closed, false if open
        simplified - True to reduce the amount of vertical lines
        Returns:
        line segment buffer with 3 components per vertex.
